review_data.title: Fantastic mezze with a twist, great bread! and super nice host
review_data.content: Our nine mezze selection plate was a great extension to my mezze loving taste buds! Most mezze were not the traditional style one is used to but a bit more juicy and mostly cooked. There was a beatiful simple one with spinach, the pepper and...More

review_data.title: Delicious Mezze and Filet Steaks
review_data.content: Great Mezze and Filet Steaks - my favourites! Good atmosphere on terrace and inside restaurant and very friendly service . Also excellent pizzas and pasta. Certainly worth a visit!

review_data.title: Great restaurant
review_data.content: I occasionally bumped on this restaurant as it is attached to the Hotel Leonardo, where I have been for a business trip. The food is delicious, there is nice outdoor dining and a great staff. A special mention to Osman for the great service.

review_data.title: Sehr freundlich
review_data.content: Essen gut, Bedienung freundlich. Auf Wunsch wurde auch etwas gemacht, dass nicht auf der Karte steht. Super Erfahrung

review_data.title: En Guete :)
review_data.content: Grosse Auswahl an Mittagsmenü, ob Vegetarisch oder mit Fleisch, dies zu sehr fairen Preisen. Das Restaurant ist stilvoll eingerichtet.

review_data.title: Home far away from Home
review_data.content: The atmosphere is serene. The service is personalized and great. The food is excellent with a wide and varied menu which is good for customers from diverse culinary backgrounds. Highly recommended.

review_data.title: Great food and service
review_data.content: 5/5 on all aspects. Ate here everyday. Will definitely come back next time I am visiting. Great staff as well

review_data.title: Family dinner
review_data.content: Went here for dinner. The restaurant was calm and service amiable. The menu contains a varity of different fish and meat dishes. The vegetarian offering is rather thin. The dishes are no culinaric exitement. Presentation and tast rather dull. Sauce cafe de paris looked thin...More

review_data.title: Super Mezze

review_data.title: Attached to Hotel
review_data.content: Breakfast is a little expensive. Light dining is very good. Full dinners looked good, but I did not have one.

review_data.title: Rigihof.
review_data.content: Gute frische Küche,gute freundliche Bedienung. Tiptop Stimmung. Sehr empfehlenswert. Weisse Engel gut gezapft!!! Whisky Auswahl.Schöne. Terrasse Liebe dieses Ort!

review_data.title: go elsewhere

review_data.title: Good pizza!
review_data.content: We enjoyed our meal here and the ambiance was very nice. Just had a light dinner of pizza and beer! Prices seemed a little higher than normal but that seemed typical for Switzerland.

review_data.title: Super
review_data.content: Die Mezze ist der Hammer und die Crevetten dazu... super. Die Mittagsmenüs sind vielseitig und einfach nur lecker. Mein Lieblingsrestaurant.

review_data.title: Three meals - all perfect!
review_data.content: Excellent experience overall. We did not want to go far from the hotel and did two dinners and one lunch in this restaurant. My husband had meat, me fish and all was amazingly good. The manager of the restaurant is very nice and friendly too....More

review_data.title: Meze antipasta - best ever!
review_data.content: Never had so tasty fresh meze than in Rigihof! Highly recommended if you like the flavour of fresh greek-turkish-oriental herbs!
